entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BinarySerialization for MAUI cannot be used on Android #6520
  • The Shell FlyoutItems didn't appear when the app is in dark theme #6519
  • CollectionView Crash on Android... RequestBuilder Error #6518
  • ListView GroupHeader background color not rendering correctly on iOS #6515
  • Windows DisplayActionSheet vertical layout is set to fill instead of center #6508
    6.0.300
  • [MacCatalyst] Lifecycle events don't trigger for minimizing and locking device #6507
  • The UmAlQura calendar is getting crashed. #6505
  • RC1 - App crash when FilePicker selects large files #6503
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Ability to record audio into a stream #6502
    Future
  • AbsoluteLayout not always setting child position and size as requested. #6500
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] ScrollView's ContentSize and ScrollX changes when the device is rotated multiple times #6499
    6.0.300
  • Talkback is not announcing the numbering for the list items and not announcing "Out of List" when the focus moves out of the list items. #6498
    6.0.300-servicing
  • the following workloads must be installed: maccatalyst #6496
    .NET 7

Closed

  • [mauipalooza] Button background doesn't render gradient #5950
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [mauipalooza] CornerRadius not working on Button #5930
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Unable to open dev tools in Windows Application. #6510
  • [mauipalooza] Border doesn't contain or wrap image #5928
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Border content alignment not centered on Windows #3471
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • MAUI Blazor template (WinUI 3) does not display WebView2 Runtime download link #6421
    6.0.300
  • Clearing and readding views to a layout results in no views being displayed #6179
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android] Wrong size and layout issues using Line, Polygon, Polyline and Path #4051
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Line (horizontal or vertical) does not show #6204
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Not rendering Line without setting Height and Width #4044
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [iOS] Calling VisualDiagnostics.RenderAs for Window causes Exception #5693
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bring DefaultRenderer concept to .NET MAUI #3594
    .NET 7
  • Context menu on wrong position in Windows, crashes in Android #6155
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • After installing .NET 7 preview everything MAUI related disappears #6396
  • Get xplat element from native view #3530
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException - NaN is not a valid value for width #6168
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • iOS Background (Remote) Notification Functionality Absent (Since Preview 12) #6259
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • PreferencesImplementation is inaccessable due to its protection level #6436
    6.0.300
  • Setting BackgroundColor from code doesn't do anything for Shapes #5974
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • (dotnet publisch ios) Unable to authenticate using the following authentication method: KeyboardInteractiveAuthenticationMethod / Invalid Bundle. #5632
    6.0.300
  • Ios Local device component css failing to load #5245
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix MAUI Blazor crash for multi-window Windows apps #6516
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
  • [WinUI] NavigationView fixing margins and corner radius #6513
  • Move colors into separate file #6511
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks from 7.0.100-preview.2.22102.8 to 7.0.100-preview.5.22226.1 #6506
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Clean up the windows code a bit #6501
    platform/windows 🪟, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] MenuBarItems are now rendered when Shell.Title is not set #6497
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢

Merged

  • [Android] Fix issues rendering gradients and CornerRadius on Button #5971
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Windows] Fix Border content position and clipping #6472
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix WebView2 Runtime download link for Blazor MAUI #6492
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Bump System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe from 4.7.1 to 6.0.0 #6354
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Rendering Shapes without explicit bounds. #5817
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Fix theme and NRE on Android and Fix Icons on WinUI #6491
    t/bug, area/ListView, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump Microsoft.VisualStudio.DesignTools.Extensibility from 16.9.31025.104 to 17.1.32210.191 #6353
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Housekeeping | Windows] Revert changes in Button focus default behavior #6234
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-button
  • Fix SwipeItems.CollectionChanged sender issue #6342
    t/bug, area/SwipeView
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.6.1.2 to 1.6.1.6 #6276
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump NUnit from 3.13.2 to 3.13.3 #6274
    dependencies
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.0 to 6.0.4 #6302
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.0 to 6.0.4 #6273
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump AspNet.Security.OAuth.Apple from 6.0.0 to 6.0.4 #6339
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.0 to 6.0.4 #6300
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump BenchmarkDotNet from 0.12.1 to 0.13.1 #6352
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Correctly render Shape Background (and BackgroundColor) #5994
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Tizen] Non-Nullable NativeParent #6459
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/architecture, platform/tizen
  • Handle content hiding separately for hot restart scenarios #6341
    area-blazor, area/tooling ⚙️

Updated

  • Spike adding implictor styles to handle null colors #6255
    do-not-merge
  • [Android] Implement Android Platform Specifics #5831
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Implement Windows Platform Specifics #5855
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Remove iOS Compat ColorExtension ToUIColor overlap #5854
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/migration 🚚
  • [iOS] Add dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.2 to 4.12.0.8 #6327
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Implement iOS Platform Specifics #5879
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [iOS] Update Editor scroll position #4850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Implement FlyoutHeaderBehavior property #5345
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Core from 15.9.20 to 17.1.0 #6281
    area/upstream, dependencies
  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Bump Xamarin.Build.Download from 0.11.0 to 0.11.1 #6335
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 119.1.0 to 120.0.0.7 #6287
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 117.0.0 to 117.0.1.5 #6309
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Svg2VectorDrawable.Net from 0.1.0 to 0.3.0 #6265
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Return zero for scaled screen size when density is zero #6337
  • Updated Default project template title #6319
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • Fix AmbigousMatchException between duplicated types Core and Controls #6409
    t/bug
  • Avoid notify changes from a null or disposed control #6060
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • Add Geolocation iOS14+ Reduced Accuracy Support #5826
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Core] Fix issue not finding IAnimationManager #6364
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬
  • Handle CA1416 violations found in MAUI repo #6237
